definition: variant of 踏實|踏实[ta1 shi5]

sentences.english: In order to let her sleep free from anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 這樣才能讓她睡的塌實。

sentences.english: Myself work dependably , the determination obeys the company discipline, is loyal to the company.
sentences.chinese: 本人做事塌實，自覺服從公司紀律，對公司忠誠。

sentences.english: The lion and the calf shall lie down together but the calf won't get much sleep.
sentences.chinese: 獅子和小牛能躺在一起，但小牛肯定睡不塌實。

sentences.english: He had a spasm of doubtful pride .
sentences.chinese: 他體驗了一陣不塌實的自豪感。

sentences.english: Although was obtaining more generous by that time, tin a daytime none of in the mind fall actually today.
sentences.chinese: 雖然當時爽快了，可今天一白天心裏都不塌實。

sentences.english: Will be willing your foot dependable place to walk later each step .
sentences.chinese: 希望你腳塌實地的走好以後的每一步。

sentences.english: That night, both of them couldn't sleep, toss and turn, toss and turn.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上這倆人都覺得心裏不塌實，在牀上翻來覆去。
